sentence.Network_en: Seraph is of the highest rank of angels in the Bible.
sentence.Network_cn: 六翼天使是圣经中级别最高的天使.

sentence.Network_en: A seraph in the realms of rest!
sentence.Network_cn: 仿佛一个天使在安息悠闲!

sentence.Network_en: Seraph fighters dropped from the cruisers, dozens of them, and gathered into swarms.
sentence.Network_cn: 六翼天使战机从巡洋舰中落下, 许许多多, 聚成一大群.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 「呃，是『炽天使』（seraph）吧。成员有……米迦勒、拉斐尔、加百列……嗯——还有乌列吧。」　　「答对了。」　　呼……都对啊。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English, back-formation from seraphim (plural), via late Latin and Greek from Hebrew śĕrāp̱īm. Compare with cherub

entry.def: In the Bible, a seraph is a kind of angel.

means.word_mean: 1. an angel of the first order; usually portrayed as the winged head of a child

auth_sentence.content: He told me that as the saddest fact, and eyed me with the one seraph eye he had, the old grief fresh in it.
auth_sentence.res_content: He told me that as the saddest fact, and eyed me with the one seraph eye he had, the old grief fresh in it.
